title: OIDC Federation Configuration
description: Configuration for OIDC identity provider federation with SPIFFE ID mapping

providers.description: List of configured OIDC identity providers

issuer.description: OIDC issuer URL (must match 'iss' claim in tokens)

client_id.description: Expected audience/client ID for token validation

jwks_endpoint.description: Optional custom JWKS endpoint (defaults to issuer/.well-known/jwks.json)

trust_domain.description: SPIFFE trust domain for mapped identities

spiffe_prefix.description: Path prefix for generated SPIFFE IDs

default_mapping.description: Default strategy for mapping platform identities to SPIFFE IDs

cache_ttl_seconds.description: TTL for JWKS cache in seconds
